title: Bug 110566: Incorrect data set result returned when an invalid filter expression 'row[0]' is set
description: When the filter expression is set as 'row[0] equals to 0', the data set does not return the correct result. Instead, it returns a null result set.
OB: Currently, when an invalid filter expression 'row[0] equals to 0' is set, the data set does not produce any error message or indicate any issue.
EB: It is expected that when an invalid filter expression 'row[0] equals to 0' is set, a relevant error message should pop up to notify the user about the invalid expression.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:  
1. Set the filter expression as 'row[0] equals to 0' in the data set.  
2. Verify that no relevant error message is displayed. Instead, the data set returns a null result set.
